alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 10:39AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage by tomorrow morning and to 4.3 feet by Tuesday evening oscillating around flood stage through the week. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.3 feet on 06/24/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.6 Sat 10 am MD 4.1 4.3 4.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
